name: Geco Designs
tagline: London Logo Design and Brand Identity Specialist
description: We are a boutique creative design agency based in South East London that uses big ideas & joined-up thinking to deliver powerful brand identity, logo design & graphic design creative. We blend considered creativity with a collaborative approach to deliver powerful results for our clients. Our passion to deliver an outstanding personable & friendly service, means we keep our customers at the forefront of everything we do, and become an extension to your internal departments.
